epd_metadata.declaration_owner: Holcim México Operaciones S.A. de C.V.

product_description.facility_location: Los Reyes facility in Alvaro Obregon, Ciudad de México, México
product_description.product_scope: 34 concrete mixes manufactured at the Holcim Mexico Operaciones S.A. de C.V. Los Reyes concrete facility

lca_information.study_goal: To comply with the procedures for creating a Type III environmental product declaration (EPD) and publish the EPD for public review.
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: Minimum of 95% of the total inflows (mass and energy) to the upstream and core modules
lca_information.data_sources: ecoinvent V3.8 database, Holcim México Operaciones S.A. de C.V. primary data

data_quality_assessment.consistency: Same modeling structure across product systems
data_quality_assessment.representativeness: Time-related coverage from 2022, geographical coverage for inputs representative of its region

end_of_life.excluded_stages: Transportation of the manufactured material to the construction site; on-site construction processes and components; building use and maintenance; and end-of-life effects.

recycled_materials_handling.recycled_reused_materials: The amount of returned concrete is based on Holcim primary data for the reference year, 2022.

additional_info.regulated_substances: No regulated substances of very high concern are utilized on site.
